title: Coronavirus: Bangladesh locks down refugee camp region
description: Cox's Bazar district hosts camps housing more than a million Rohingya Muslims displaced from Myanmar.
content:
Image copyrightAFPImage caption
 There are concerns that overcrowding in the camps could exacerbate a coronavirus outbreak
Bangladesh has imposed a lockdown on a southern district, home to refugee camps housing more than a million Rohingya Muslims fleeing f… [+1735 chars]
